customMethods.name: setKpi1
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	query = """
SELECT 
	SUM((CASE WHEN [checkin] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ) AS [TotalEventAttendees]
FROM [RITIOps].[calendar].[EventAttendance]
	INNER JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [EventAttendance].[humanId]
"""
	args = []

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Total Event Attendees'
	kpi1.props.params.Value = result

customMethods.name: XsetKpi1
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	query = """
SELECT 
	SUM((CASE WHEN [checkin] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) + (CASE WHEN [checkout] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) ) AS [TotalEventAttendees]
FROM [RITIOps].[calendar].[EventAttendance]
	INNER JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [EventAttendance].[humanId]
"""
	args = []

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Total Event Attendees'
	kpi1.props.params.Value = result

customMethods.name: setKpi2
customMethods.script:
# Total Referrals (Year To Date): total count of referrals since 1/1 of the current year
	
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	query = """
WITH cteActiveParticipants AS (
SELECT DISTINCT
	[humanId]
FROM [RITIOps].[calendar].[EventAttendance]
)

SELECT count(1) cnt
FROM cteActiveParticipants
	INNER JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[humanId] = cteActiveParticipants.[humanId]

"""

	args = []

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	
	kpi2.props.params.Title = 'Active Participants'
	kpi2.props.params.Value = result

customMethods.name: setKpi3
customMethods.script:
# New Referrals Monthly: count of referrals per month in a XY Chart
	
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	args = []
	wherePlus = ''
	
	query = """	
DECLARE @today datetime = GETDATE();
DECLARE @dayFewMonthsBefore datetime = DATEADD(MONTH,-5,@today);
DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(@dayFewMonthsBefore),MONTH(@dayFewMonthsBefore),1);

;WITH cteEvent AS (
SELECT 
	 [EventAttendance].[id]
	,[EventAttendance].[checkin]
	,[EventAttendance].[checkout]
FROM [calendar].[EventAttendance]
	INNER JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [EventAttendance].[humanId]
)

,cteInOut AS (
SELECT 
	[checkin] AS [TimeStamp]
	,DATEFROMPARTS(DATEPART(year,[checkin]),DATEPART(month,[checkin]),1) AS [FirstMonthDay]
FROM cteEvent
WHERE checkin IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	 [checkout] AS [TimeStamp]
	,DATEFROMPARTS(DATEPART(year,[checkout]),DATEPART(month,[checkout]),1) AS [FirstMonthDay]
FROM cteEvent
WHERE checkout IS NOT NULL
)

,cteMonthTotal AS (
SELECT
	[FirstMonthDay]	
	,COUNT(1) cnt
FROM cteInOut
WHERE [TimeStamp] >= @dateFrom
GROUP BY [FirstMonthDay])


,cteArray(FirstDay) AS (
	SELECT DATEADD(month,0,@dateFrom) union all SELECT DATEADD(month,1,@dateFrom) 
	union all SELECT DATEADD(month,2,@dateFrom) union all SELECT DATEADD(month,3,@dateFrom) 
	union all SELECT DATEADD(month,4,@dateFrom) union all SELECT DATEADD(month,5,@dateFrom)  
)

SELECT 
	cteMonthTotal.cnt
	,cteArray.[FirstDay]
FROM cteArray
LEFT JOIN cteMonthTotal ON cteMonthTotal.[FirstMonthDay] = cteArray.[FirstDay] 
ORDER BY cteArray.[FirstDay]
"""
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	

	_values = [dict(applicants = row['cnt'] if row['cnt'] else 0, time = row['FirstDay']) for row in result]
	
	kpi3.props.params.Value = _values 
	kpi3.props.params.Title = 'Event Attendance Monthly'

customMethods.name: XsetKpiX4
customMethods.script:
kpi4 = self.getChild("KPIx4")
	query = """
DECLARE @today datetime = GETDATE();
	DECLARE @dayNextMonth datetime = DATEADD(MONTH,1,@today);
	DECLARE @dateFrom datetime = DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(@dayNextMonth),MONTH(@dayNextMonth),1);
	DECLARE @dateTo datetime = DATEADD(month,1,@dateFrom);
	
	;WITH cteEvent AS (
	SELECT 
		 [EventAttendance].[id]
		,[EventAttendance].[checkin]
		,[EventAttendance].[checkout]
	FROM [calendar].[EventAttendance]
		INNER JOIN [participant].[Participant] ON [Participant].[humanId] = [EventAttendance].[humanId]
	)
	
	,cteInOut AS (
	SELECT 
		[checkin] AS [TimeStamp]
		,DATEFROMPARTS(DATEPART(year,[checkin]),DATEPART(month,[checkin]),1) AS [FirstMonthDay]
	FROM cteEvent
	WHERE checkin IS NOT NULL
	UNION ALL
	SELECT 
		 [checkout] AS [TimeStamp]
		,DATEFROMPARTS(DATEPART(year,[checkout]),DATEPART(month,[checkout]),1) AS [FirstMonthDay]
	FROM cteEvent
	WHERE checkout IS NOT NULL
	)
	
	SELECT 7
	FROM cteInOut
	WHERE [TimeStamp] >= @dateFrom AND [TimeStamp] < @dateTo
"""
	args = []

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')
	system.perspective.print(("_values:",result))


	kpi4.props.params.Title = 'Events in the Next Month'
	kpi4.props.params.Value = result if result else 0

customMethods.name: cleanKpis
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	#kpiX4 = self.getChild("KPIx4")	

	kpi1.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi1.props.params.Value = 0
		
	kpi2.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi2.props.params.Value = 0

	kpi3.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi3.props.params.Value = []

	#kpiX4.props.params.Title = ''
	#kpiX4.props.params.Value = 0
